name: No Greater Joy
description: A Teensyville script perfect for 5-6 players. Focuses on core mechanics with clear information and straightforward gameplay.
author: Community Created - Teensyville
setupNotes: Standard Teensyville setup. Remove characters as needed based on exact player count. Recommended as a first script for new players.
howToRun: Positive-leaning protections and benevolent twists. Ensure protection stacking is ruled. Celebrate reveals to keep pace fun.

firstNight.description: Wake all Minions together. Show them who the other Minions are and who the Demon is
Wake the Demon. Show them who their Minions are. Give them 3 character tokens as bluffs

tipsAndTricks: Good: Chain protections around confirmed players. Evil: Bypass protection indirectly (poison, misdirection).
bluffing: Claim soft utility roles that explain patience and survivals.

modifiers.note: Soldier and Saint provide overlapping survival abilities.
Recluse benefits from characters that can detect or confirm alignment changes.
Drunk needs Townsfolk with abilities to malfunction.
Baron adds 2 Outsiders and removes 2 Townsfolk.
